resources.string: Select start date for the reports
Any short bank name for report
Set SMS From: bank addressee (exactly from SMS). Applies if one card in one bank
Set Card last four digits in SMS. Applies if multiple cards in one bank
SMS addressee Name from SMS of your bank

" To create a report, please fill in the information as shown in the SMS. Different options below can be selected for different cards or banks. Scan only the first time, then the information is updated when the program is re-opened."

" To create a report, please fill in the information as shown in the SMS. Different options below can be selected for different cards or banks. Scan only the first time, then the information is updated when the program is re-opened."
